The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 December is 2,046,892 (3,636.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 24 December, there were 226,636 new confirmed cases (402.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 December, there were 172,143 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 32% (54,493 extra cases).
